mapper.insert: insert into project(projectname, languagenum, projectdate, isdeleted) values(#{projectName}, #{languageNum}, now(), 0)
mapper.select: select * from project p join team t on p.projectnum = t.projectnum where userid=#{userId} and p.isdeleted = 0 and t.isdeleted = 0 and (t.bookmark = 0 or t.bookmark is null) order by p.projectnum
select * from project p join team t on p.projectnum = t.projectnum where userid=#{userId} and p.isdeleted = 0 and t.bookmark = 1 and t.isdeleted = 0 order by p.projectnum
mapper.update: update project set languagenum=#{languageNum}, projectname=#{projectName} where projectnum=#{projectNum}
update project set isdeleted=1 where projectnum=#{projectNum}
update team set bookmark=1 where projectnum=#{projectNum}
